diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of User Experience (UX).
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD UX[User Experience UX] --> Research[User Research Methods] UX --> Design[UX Design Process] UX --> Testing[Testing & Validation] UX --> Strategy[UX Strategy & Planning] UX --> Psychology[UX Psychology & Principles] UX --> Tools[UX Tools & Software] Research --> UserInterviews[User Interviews
Qualitative Insights] Research --> Surveys[Surveys & Questionnaires
Quantitative Data] Research --> Personas[User Personas
Target User Profiles] Research --> UserJourneys[User Journey Mapping
Experience Flows] Research --> Ethnography[Ethnographic Research
Field Observation] Research --> Analytics[Behavioral Analytics
User Tracking] Design --> DesignThinking[Design Thinking
Empathize to Test] Design --> Wireframes[Wireframes
Low-Fidelity Layouts] Design --> Prototypes[Prototypes
Interactive Mockups] Design --> InformationArch[Information Architecture
Content Structure] Design --> InteractionDesign[Interaction Design
User Flows] Design --> VisualDesign[Visual Design
Aesthetics & Brand] Testing --> UsabilityTesting[Usability Testing
Task-Based Testing] Testing --> ABTesting[A/B Testing
Variant Comparison] Testing --> UserTesting[User Testing
Real User Feedback] Testing --> HeuristicEval[Heuristic Evaluation
Expert Review] Strategy --> UXGoals[UX Goals & Objectives] Strategy --> Metrics[Metrics & KPIs
Success Measures] Strategy --> Roadmap[Product Roadmap
Feature Prioritization] Psychology --> CognitiveLoad[Cognitive Load Theory] Psychology --> Gestalt[Gestalt Principles] Psychology --> Affordances[Affordances & Signifiers] Tools --> Figma[Figma & Sketch
Design Tools] Tools --> InVision[InVision & Axure
Prototyping] Tools --> Hotjar[Hotjar & Mixpanel
Analytics Tools]
